name: Own The Doge
description: Own The Doge (ownthedoge.com) is the official Doge project, community, and token ($DOG) directly linked to The Doge NFT, endorsed by Atsuko Sato, the owner of Kabosu — the Shiba Inu behind the iconic Doge meme. As a provenance coin, $DOG is backed by the original Doge meme, purchased on-chain from Atsuko Sato, granting exclusive Doge IP rights to Own The Doge. This has enabled partnerships with entities like Revolut and D3 (.doge domains), and the creation of Doge-themed collectibles. Organized as a Doge fan club with DAO governance, holders can vote and submit grants for Doge-related public goods and cultural projects, such as a Hollywood-backed Doge documentary, the annual Doge Day on November 2nd, a bronze statue replica of the meme photo in Tokyo, and sending The Doge NFT to space on SpaceX’s DOGE-1 mission. Committed to 'Do Only Good Everyday,' the community has donated millions to charity, including being the largest crypto donor to Save The Children.
